sections.title: Home
sections.content: Welcome to the Miscellaneous page of the website! This is the part of the site that will contain all the information that doesn't really relate to anything under the stuff on the sidebar and doesn't deserve its own spot there too. Enjoy!

sections.title: Updates
sections.content: This is the update page, where I catalogue the changes the website has gone through over the past few years. It may get a bit technical!

sections.title: FAQ
sections.content:
Hello! This is where I'll be including some questions and answers that I get from time to time! :)

Q: How did you make this website?
A: I've talked about it here in the about part of the website.

Q: What is the website coded in?
A: AngularJS, HTML and CSS.

Q: Why not get the music up on Spotify / Apple Music?
I've actually tried! The problem with that is that we need to get licensing rights for some songs, and also there is a lot of cost involved that I'm trying to avoid to get the music on there. I'd like a playlist of VJChoir music on these platforms too but there's no easy way to get stuff on there :(

Q: How long will you maintain this website for?
I mean right now I have no plans to stop, but maintaining it does take up a lot of time and effort (but mainly around SOV season for updating information).
